title: Welcome to Loops!
body:
You're part of something special

ğŸ”” Notifications You Control

Choose exactly which activities ping you â€” likes, followers, mentions, or none at all. Turn down the noise without missing what matters to you.

ğŸŒ Understanding Federation

Loops is built on ActivityPub, the same open protocol that powers Mastodon, Pixelfed, PeerTube, and hundreds of other federated platforms. This means:

  • Your content travels: When you post a Loop, it's automatically shared with your followers across all ActivityPub platforms.
  • Anyone can follow you: People on Mastodon, Pixelfed, or any ActivityPub server can follow your Loops account and see your videos in their home feed.
  • No lock-in: Choose your instance, or run your own server. Export your data anytime. You're never trapped in a walled garden.
  • Real decentralization: No single company controls the network. It's social media by the people, for the people.

âœ“No data mining â€” we don't track you, profile you, or sell your information.

âœ“Open source â€” every line of code is public. Transparency is built in.

âœ“Community owned â€” you have a voice in platform decisions and future direction.

title: Introducing the For You Feed
body:
Discover Content Made for You

The For You feed is now live! Discover creators and videos tailored to your interests based on your activity â€” all while maintaining the transparency and control you expect from Loops.

âœ¨ How It Works

Our algorithm analyzes your engagement patterns â€” what you like, share, comment on, and watch â€” to surface content we think you'll enjoy. Unlike corporate platforms, we focus on genuine interest, not engagement bait or sponsored content.

What influences your For You feed:
  • Videos you like, share, and comment on
  • Creators you follow and engage with
  • Hashtags you interact with frequently
  • Similar content from across the fediverse
  • Trending topics in your communities
